mapper.sql: uuid, purchaseprojcode, purchasesectioncode, unifieddealcode, xcprojectcode, projcontactor, ProjContactPhone, BuyerName, BuyerContactor, BuyerContactPhone, AgentName, AgentContactor, AgentContactPhone, Budget, ReceiveFileStartTime, ReceiveFileEndTime, ReceiveFileAddress, SellingPrice, ReceiveFileWay,TenderStartTime,TenderEndTime, BidOpenningTime, BidOpenAddress, publishtime, Attachment, bulletintype, platformcode, placecode, Pubserviceplatcode, Customer, createtime, creator, updatetime, modifier, publisher, status, ReceiveFile, ReceiveNotice, correctionTimes, vsheetId, purchaseLinkeAddress, purchaseFileLinkeAddress, version
purchaseprojname, bulletintitle, Bulletincontent, BuyerAddress, AgentAddress, ProjBasicInfo, BidderRequirement, OtherNode, PolicyNode, publishmedia, url, Notes, richTextContent
mapper.select: select count(*) from bulletin_notice_view where publishtime <= #{publishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and status=3

select uuid,purchaseprojcode,purchaseprojname,bulletintitle,xcprojectcode,AgentName,publishtime,createtime,status,type from bulletin_notice_view where publishtime <= #{publishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and status=3 order by createtime desc limit #{startrow,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{rows,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select uuid,purchaseprojcode,purchaseprojname,bulletintitle,xcprojectcode,AgentName,publishtime,createtime,status,type from bulletin_notice_view where publishtime <= #{publishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and status=3 order by createtime desc limit 0,#{toprows,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

SELECT bn.uuid,bn.purchaseprojcode,bn.purchaseprojname,bn.bulletintitle,bn.xcprojectcode,bn.AgentName,bn.publishtime,bn.createtime,bn.status,bp.buymethod as type from purchase_project pp,budget_project bp,bulletin_notice bn where pp.budgetProjectId=bp.projectcode and pp.purchaseprojcode=bn.purchaseprojcode and DATE_FORMAT(bn.BidOpenningTime,'%Y-%m-%d')=#{openBidTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION SELECT bn.uuid,bn.purchaseprojcode,bn.purchaseprojname,bn.bulletintitle,bn.xcprojectcode,bn.AgentName,bn.announcementTime as publishtime,bn.creationTime as createtime,bn.status,bp.buymethod as type FROM purchase_project pp,budget_project bp,bulletin_notice_consultations bn where pp.budgetProjectId=bp.projectcode and pp.purchaseprojcode=bn.purchaseprojcode and DATE_FORMAT(bn.negotiationTime,'%Y-%m-%d')=#{openBidTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select uuid,purchaseprojcode,purchaseprojname,bulletintitle,xcprojectcode,AgentName,publishtime,createtime,status,type from bulletin_notice_view where publishtime <= #{publishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and status=3 and bulletintitle like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') order by createtime desc limit #{startrow,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{rows,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select count(*) from bulletin_notice_view where publishtime <= #{publishtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and status=3 and bulletintitle like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into bulletin_notice (uuid, purchaseprojcode, purchasesectioncode, unifieddealcode, xcprojectcode, projcontactor, ProjContactPhone, BuyerName, BuyerContactor, BuyerContactPhone,
